Monotone Cubic Interpolation:
Main function

Parameters:
via_points  (input) array containing the via point positions (tool space)
via_points_time  (input) array containing the time between two via points
number_of_via_points  (input) number of via points
theta_vel  (output) array containing the velocities theta_vel[i][j] of the joint j at time i*dt.
number_vel_intervals  (output) Number of total time intervals, the velocity profile constists of.
dt  (input) Lenght of time interval of the velocity profile.

Monotone Cubic Interpolation:
Evaluate Cubic polynomial

Returns:
Position at t
Parameters:
p_a  (input) position at t=0
p_b  (input) position at t=1
m_a  (input) slope at t=0
m_b  (input) slope at t=1
t  (input) Evaluation takes place at t=[0,1]

int  number_of_via_points,
float  m[][6]

Monotone Cubic Interpolation:
Precalculation of the slopes at the via points. The slopes of the first and last point are set to zero.

Parameters:
via_points  (input) array containing the via point positions (tool space)
number_of_via_points  (input) number of via points
m  (output) array containing the slopes at the via points

Monotone Cubic Interpolation:
Calculates velocity profile

Parameters:
via_points  (input) array containing the via point positions (tool space)
via_points_time  (input) array containing the time between two via points
number_of_via_points  (input) number of via points
m  (input) array containing the slopes at the via points
theta_vel  (output) array containing the velocities theta_vel[i][j] of the joint j at time i*dt.
number_vel_intervals  (output) Number of total time intervals, the velocity profile constists of.
dt  (input) Lenght of time interval of the velocity profile.
